snippet.title: Mt Waverley property increases $138K a month for nine months - realestate.com.au
snippet.content:
, was snapped up for more than $2.8 million before auction.
A MT Waverley property has jumped $1.245 million in price in just nine months. No. previously traded in the form of a three-bedroom weatherboard in October last year, where it reaped $1.635 million. After generating $138,333 a month, it was snapped up before auction for $2.88 million on July 27. SUBURB PROFILE: LLC Real Estate Mt Waverley director Andy Lou said around 90 buyers inspected the home. "A local family bought it, who were wanting to upgrade their home," Mr Lou said. "The location, quality and luxury the home offered made it very attractive." He said there was still good demand in the local market for high-end homes.
